sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TFundMarket ( marketdate, fundname, fundcode, fundtacode, fundcompany, fundtype, foundeddate, fundrisklevel, fundmanager, currentnav, currentstate, fundincome, fundincomerate, navdate, totalnav, fundriseweek, fundrisemonth, fundrisethreemonth, fundrisehalfyear, fundriseyear, fundrisethisyear, newscale, ratechange, fundsortthreemonth, fundtotalthreemonth, createtime, updatetime) VALUES ( #marketDate#, #fundName#, #fundCode#, #fundTACode#, #fundCompany#, #fundType#, #foundedDate#, #fundRiskLevel#, #fundManager#, #currentNav#, #currentState#, #fundIncome#, #fundIncomeRate#, #navDate#, #totalNav#, #fundRiseWeek#, #fundRiseMonth#, #fundRiseThreeMonth#, #fundRiseHalfYear#, #fundRiseYear#, #fundRiseThisYear#, #newScale#, #rateChange#, #fundSortThreeMonth#, #fundTotalThreeMonth#, #createTime#, #updateTime# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TFundMarket SET marketdate=#marketDate#, fundname=#fundName#, fundtacode=#fundTACode#, fundcompany=#fundCompany#, fundtype=#fundType#, foundeddate=#foundedDate#, fundrisklevel=#fundRiskLevel#, fundmanager=#fundManager#, currentnav=#currentNav#, fundincome=#fundIncome#, fundincomerate=#fundIncomeRate#, navdate=#navDate#, totalnav=#totalNav#, fundriseweek=#fundRiseWeek#, fundrisemonth=#fundRiseMonth#, fundrisethreemonth=#fundRiseThreeMonth#, fundrisehalfyear=#fundRiseHalfYear#, fundriseyear=#fundRiseYear#, fundrisethisyear=#fundRiseThisYear#, newscale=#newScale#, ratechange=#rateChange#, fundsortthreemonth=#fundSortThreeMonth#, fundtotalthreemonth=#fundTotalThreeMonth#, updatetime=#updateTime# WHERE fundcode=#fundCode#
sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM TFundMarket WHERE fundcode=#fundCode# AND navdate=#navDate#
